name: Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe
name_original: Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe
description:
As a Warlock, fund your expedition to discover rare and powerful flora through your participation in the lucrative profession of star farming. Build the ultimate space farm as you explore the galaxy and stumble onto the mystery of a dead planet. Cultivate exotic plant life, trade your harvests for credits, and customize your runs with unique powers in this roguelite adventure.

Harvest the Cosmos

Venture into uncharted territories and gather an array of seeds and rare materials.

Cultivate Your Bounty

Onboard your trusty spaceship, transform your harvested resources into flourishing crops. Create the ultimate interstellar farm.

Warlock Life

On your travels, find rare and powerful flora you can bring back to your den. These plants can then be utilised to give you powerful boons on your runs.

Trade Among the Stars

Encounter wandering traders during your galactic escapades and strike deals to sell your produce for credits.

Decorate Your Ship

Find furniture on your expeditions and bring them back to spice up your farm.

Upgrade Your Cosmic Expedition

Spend your hard-earned credits to enhance yourself and your spaceship.

Unravel the Secrets

Immerse yourself in a story that unravels the mysteries of a long-dead planet. The fate of this forgotten world lies in your hands.

Features

  • Auto-firing weapons
  • Fast runs (under 15 minutes)
  • Over 200 unique powers available to customise your runs
  • Find furniture and cuddly companions on your runs to take back to your ship
  • Expand your farm, recruit drones to aid you in the busy work, and use your profits to increase the power of your character
  • Each run takes you to many different planets, survive waves lasting 20-40 seconds and harvest as much as you can in that time
